p: Female C57BL/6J mice (5 weeks old, six mice per group) were purchased from the Jackson Laboratory and subcutaneously inoculated on the ventral side of the right hind footpad with 10 5 PFUs of CHIKV as previously described (Acharya et al., 2015). Mice were intraperitoneally inoculated with 50 μg of CHKVmabs or PBS at 12 h post‐CHIKV infection. Mice were bled retro‐orbitally at 2 dpi to measure viraemia.
